lessons.japanese: このコーヒー店には芸術家を志すものが足しげく通う。
lessons.english: This coffee shop is frequented by aspiring artists.

lessons.japanese: 彼はやろうと志すものは、何でもやり遂げる。
lessons.english: He accomplishes whatever he sets out to do.

lessons.japanese: 彼が医者を志すのはありそうなことだと思った。
lessons.english: We thought it was in the cards for him to aim to become a doctor.

lessons.japanese: 生命の尊さを考えた事のない人は医学を志すべきではない。
lessons.english: Those who have never thought about the value of life should not study medicine.
